title: Best of The Program | Guest: Rev. Johnnie Moore | 9/2/21
description:
Glenn and Stu discuss Texas’ new heartbeat abortion law. Glenn reads some angry tweets from people who hate Texas' new heartbeat abortion law. Author and pastor Johnnie Moore joins to share his efforts to save Christians from Afghanistan and how fast Afghanistan has crumbled under President Biden. The CDC has released guidance on how to appropriately describe people with addictions, and Glenn and Stu discuss the absurdity. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
